tweets.text: On one hand I would like to some day be a homeowner, on the other hand, I would like to some day own a thom browne suit

RT @williams_paige: dingdingdingdingding 

https://t.co/JYNvfrvvI9 https://t.co/2U8arOwQh4

Its pretty clear if you follow the trend of certain YouTube personalities who followed the money & views over the last few years, plenty of skill with entertainment skills and no morals, completely invisible influence

If I had a ton of money and wanted to get livestreamers to cover a certain subject a certain way, I bet you could get a ton of bang for your buck by just tipping them whenever they say something that aligns with your message, probably way more effective than twitter bots https://t.co/vE6Y5bVewv
@currankelleher I am a big fan of it for generating ideas now, though, my mind wanders to slightly different directions‚Ä¶ https://t.co/aNkYzVumu0
I for one trust the guy trying to teach the new AI how to meditate over all Google leadership but thats just me
zeitgeist discussion over AI becoming sentient way more pleasurable than zeitgeist discussion about literally anything else, for me personally
the fun thing about streaming TV now is I have no idea how long a season is on any particular streaming property so after like, episode 6 of any TV show, everything else is a bonus to me
I look up what time Barry airs every Sunday, that's how good that show is (it's in 9 minutes)

The theory being, of course, that if you cut your carrots and celery and onions to their various sizes and arrange them intelligently ahead of time it means you can work more effectively in the heat of the moment
did you want tremendous numbers of json files with fips codes as their filenames? because boy are you in luck

making plans for the ultimate super historical election makefile json builder

one build command to rule them all, one scraper to find them, one makefile to bring them all, and in the darkness bind them

i bought my first bacon egg and cheese since pandemic and i went to go make coffee to eat it and have a perfect morning and when i came back MY CAT WAS EATING THE BACON OUT OF MY SANDWICH, WHAT A CRUEL BETRAYAL

okay it took way more effort than it should have but I finally made it so that I can have footnotes AND a table of contents! https://t.co/fgId9Owuzf

Another day of traversing NY/NJ trains and turnpikes

Great send-off drinks from @vocativ on Friday- but now it‚Äôs Monday and back to freelance life! Get in touch for any dataviz: ejfox@ejfox.com
I want to have a little more time to pursue personal projects, and plan for a big cross-country roadtrip, will be freelancing a bit.
It was a great year and a half at @vocativ - and I met some of my favorite people, and built some incredible things, bittersweet to move on.
This gives me hope, if Gucci can catch up on GoT maybe I can
